name: Fruits Garden Match 3 Diamond FREE - Bigo Version
name_original: Fruits Garden Match 3 Diamond FREE - Bigo Version
description:
Candy Garden Version Bigo is a new 3-match FREE game. It is more challenging and more interesting.
With excellent graphics, you may never get bored in Fruits Garden. Props could always be the booster in your adventure!
Fruits Garden features:
● Surprises for you in each level
● Over 100 levels for you to challenge. More levels coming soon!
● Lovely graphics and powerful boosters!
● Gold coins and silvers can be Free got to help you pass levels

How to play:
1. Match 3 or more same type to clear them.
2. Win the levels before you run out of moves. It's so easy.

Fruits Garden is a free time killer, such interesting game now available on Google Play
